result.html: bean ghránna íShe is an ugly woman.
result.ponchtml: bean ġránna íShe is an ugly woman.

result.eng: The ordinary world is too ugly compared to the world of literature.
result.ga: tá an gnáthshaol róghránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríochta
result.orig: Tá an gnáthshaol róghránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríochta
result.html: tá an gnáthshaol róghránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríochtaThe ordinary world is too ugly compared to the world of literature.
result.ponchtml: tá an gnáṫẛaol róġránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríoċtaThe ordinary world is too ugly compared to the world of literature.

result.eng: He surprised her! That was nasty of him.
result.ga: tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi ba ghránna an mhaise dó é
result.orig: Tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi Ba ghránna an mhaise dó é

result.ponchtml: ṫáinig sé aniar aduaiḋ uirṫi ba ġránna an ṁaise dó éHe surprised her! That was nasty of him.
